item.title: [B][COLOR lawngreen]• [COLOR white]VARIOS CANAIS NO FIM DA LISTA[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR lawngreen]•[COLOR white] [B]FUTEBOL [COLOR blue](Escolhe a tua Liga)[/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Liga ', ['LA LIGA', 'LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'COPA DE ESPAÑA', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA']) lists = ['SPANISH LA LIGA', 'SPANISH LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'SPANISH CUP', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param2] [/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][B][makelist.param5] [/B] [/COLOR][COLOR lightyellow] [makelist.param6] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightblue][[makelist.param4]] [/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Teamblue+[makelist.param5]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://cdn.arenavision.biz/$doregex[canal]</page> <referer>http://cdn.arenavision.biz</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <regex> <name>canal</name> <expres>$pyFunction:'[makelist.param6]'.replace('>4','04').replace('>5','05').replace('>6','06').replace('>7','07').replace('>8','08').replace('>9','09').replace('>10','10').replace('>11','tk/11').replace('>12','12').replace('>13','13').replace('>14','14').replace('>15','15').replace('>16','16').replace('>17','17').replace('>18','18').replace('>19','19').replace('>20','20').replace('>21','21').replace('>22','22').replace('>23','23').replace('>24','24').replace('>25','25').replace('>26','26').replace('>27','27').replace('>28','28').replace('>29','29').replace('>30','30').replace('>31','31').replace('>32','32').replace('>33','33').replace('>34','34').replace('>35','35').replace('>1','01').replace('>>2','02').replace('>3','03')</expres> <page></page> </regex> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teamblue65/LOGO/master/ARENAVISION.png</thumbnail>
